Installing libraries.
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```
Loading data.
```{r}
dillon_data = read.csv("census_data_final.csv")
fips_codes = read.csv("uscounties.csv")
counties = read_xlsx("counties.xlsx")
```

```{r}
dillon_data = dillon_data[,-1]
fips_codes = fips_codes %>% select(county, county_full, state_name)

#joining data
joined_df = left_join(dillon_data, fips_codes, by=c("CTYNAME" = "county_full", "STNAME" = "state_name"))

#joining with AJ's dataset now
complete_df = left_join(counties, joined_df, by = c("ALLCOUNTIES"="county", "STATE" = "STNAME"))

complete_df = complete_df %>% select(-c(CTYNAME, `VARIABLE NAME`))

#writing to csv file
write.csv(complete_df, "census_data_merged1.csv")
```
